overview:
Dallas Bessant is a financial consultant for GAT International, Inc.

Dallas Bessant’s areas of expertise include, venture capital, reinsurance, financial guarantee insurance, bonds and performance bonds, financial fraud detection and fraud prevention, financial risk analysis, construction loans, private venture loans, private banking and private loan consolidation.

Dallas Bessant has been helping businesses achieve their goals for over 30 years, by working closely with businesses, investors and financial institutions, to help companies with all of their financial needs.
